channel.title: Octostudio on CoderDojo Schöneweide
channel.description: Recent content in Octostudio on CoderDojo Schöneweide

item.title: Pet App
item.description: In the “Pet App” workshop, participants get an insight into how to program a digital pet that gets hungry and needs to be fed. OctoStudio is used for this purpose, which is an app for mobile devices that allows you to program apps. After a short round of inspiration, participants, together with their mentors, parents, or alone, use the guide provided by us to program a basic pet app and get to know OctoStudio.
